column5: This house is just an Uber away from the cowboys, Rangers, 6 flags, the Highlands and the airport! The neighborhood is very laid back and a great place to relax. I recently moved to Dallas and i couldn't imagine letting go of my house. I decided to share it with travelers that are looking for a cozy home while away from home. I wouldn't expect guests to stay anywhere i wasn't willing to stay myself. I take great pride in my house and keep it clean and comfortable. Hope you enjoy your stay!
